item.title: EP 62 - Penis Worship
item.itunes:title: Penis Worship
item.description:
Today we investigate whether killing your best friend can help you join the Illuminati, and then we take a lick, I mean a look, at the history of Penis Worship.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Back in 2013, an aspiring rapper tried to murder his best friend as a "blood sacrifice." Would such an action actually allow someone to join the Illuminati? And why do friends of Lady Gaga keep falling to their deaths?

Then we travel around the world to explore the complicated history of penis worship. Was Jesus's foreskin stolen? Can you worship the dick in a church? And is there a video that is so powerfully infused with Satanic magic it could turn any man gay?

Links:

Wafeeq El-Amin Trial: Aspiring Virginia Rapper Who Shot Friend Scheduled For Two-Day Trial In June

https://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/03/15/wafeeq-el-amin-trial_n_2882650.html

Crazy Rapper Tried To Sacrifice his Friend To Join The Illuminati

http://www.illuminatiagenda.com/crazy-rapper-tried-to-sacrifice-his-friend-to-join-the-illuminati/

Henrico jury finds aspiring rapper guilty in shooting

https://www.richmond.com/news/henrico-jury-finds-aspiring-rapper-guilty-in-shooting/article_4c06ad5e-1d27-5808-a221-cefca9446763.html

Lady Gaga Apologizes for Drawing ‘Unjust Conclusion’ on Cause of Rick 'Zombie Boy' Genest's Death

https://people.com/music/lady-gaga-apology-rick-zombie-boy-genest-death/

Venerated Members

https://thenewinquiry.com/venerated-members/

Did the Vatican steal Jesus' foreskin so people would shut up about the savior's penis?

http://www.slate.com/articles/life/faithbased/2006/12/fore_shame.html

The phallic ‘Savior of the World’ hidden in the Vatican

http://freethoughtnation.com/the-phallic-savior-of-the-world-hidden-in-the-vatican/

NSFW

Temple Priapus

https://templepriapus.org/

SURRENDER TO THE DARK DEMON GAY LUST INSIDE YOU

https://www.pornhub.com/view_video.php?viewkey=ph586f27026372a

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!
